TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IJob

Docs.remarks: All jobs scheduled must implement the IJob interface. Objects implementing the IJob interface must be serializable. The class must contain a default constructor. All members values that need to persist must be public, or the values will not be stored in the database.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void perform() cil managed

Docs.summary: The perform method gets executed by the worker process.
Docs.remarks: All operations should be placed inside the perform method
